p: Table 1 first shows the populations and GDPs, in order to help estimating the scale, medical level, and affluence scale of the selected countries. It is obvious that East Asia is one of the most densely populated areas in the world. It can also be seen that there is not much difference with respect of the GDPs, except for China. However, Chinaâ€™s GDP has grown rather rapidly in recent years, and it is certain that it will reach the economic level of the other countries sooner or later.
